                                        : : Skulletron : :

                Skulletron smiled, and nodded in agreement.

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 11, 2002 12:34:36 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Skulletron/Wolfenstein/Megatron

Perceptor:


"He's the greaterst Predacon warrior of all times" said Perceptor

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
>                                                : : Skulletron : :
>   =20
>                        Skulletron nodded at Wolfenstein.
>=20
>                                    Skulletron: I've never met=20
Megatron
> either.  It's going to be interesting.
>=20
> -------Original Message-------
>=20
> From: nbwrpg@y...
> Date: August 11, 2002 12:24:03 AM
> To: nbwrpg@y...
> Subject: Re: Skulletron/Wolfenstein/Megatron
>=20
> OOC: You mean Wolfenstein, not DrillBit. ^_^
>=20
> : : Wolfenstein : :
>=20
> Wolfenstein just follows Perceptor in the Predacon base.
>=20
> Wolfenstein: At last I will meet Megatron...
> ----- Original Message -----=20
> From: airly2000=20
> To: nbwrpg@y...=20
> Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2002 12:17 AM
> Subject: Re: Skulletron/Wolfenstein/Megatron
>=20
>=20
> Perceptor::
>=20
> "Yes master"replied Perceptor by comm link after that he looked=20
> towards Skulletron and Drillbit and said "Follow me"=20
>=20
> Then he walked towards the entrace of Predacon's base
>=20
>=20
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > -- Megatron / Switchblade --
> >=20
> > Megatron looks amused as Flicker explains his plan to infiltrate=20
> the=20
> > Maximal base. "Interesting, very interesting. Quickstrike and=20
> > Inferno will escort you two to the control room for futher=20
analysis=20
> > of your plan," He nods to Inferno and Quickstrike, "I have a few=20
> > other things to take care of before anything is decided."
> >=20
> > He turns to the still open entrance to the Predacon base, and=20
yells=20
> > out to Skulletron, Wolfenstein, and Perceptor. "PERCEPTOR, BRING=20
> > SKULLETRON AND WOLFENSTEIN INTO THE BASE." He stands beside the=20
> > corridor entrance that he'd come from, waiting for Perceptor to=20
> > bring the two bots into the base.
> >=20
> > -----------------------------
> >=20
> > Switchblade wanders around through the walls and cicuitry of the=20
> > base. He knew most of the base, but he hadn't taken the time to=20
> > totally memorize the inner parts of the base. He'd arrive at the=20
> > control center. It was just a matter of when. (heh a delay post=20
=3Dp)
>=20
>=20
>=20

Service.=20
